title: Nightmare Before Christmas: Jack Skellington Pumpkin King Mini Backpack [Entertainment Earth]
descriptionHtml:
Bring the fun and excitement of Halloween Town anywhere with this stylish Jack Skellington Pumpkin King Mini Backpack from Loungefly. Crafted with superior detail, this spooktacular mini backpack is perfect for any Nightmare Before Christmas fan!

Nightmare Before Christmas Jack Skellington Pumpkin King Mini-Backpack - Entertainment Earth Exclusive:

  • Jack's got your back… pack!
  • Jack Skellington is The Pumpkin King in this exclusive mini backpack!
  • It's spectacular in orange-and-black, with shiny gold-colored hardware.
  • Features top and front zipper closure, a handle, adjustable straps, and more!

Entertainment Earth Exclusive! The Pumpkin King has your back. Spectacular in orange-and-black-printed faux leather with shiny gold-colored hardware, this sensational Nightmare Before Christmas Jack Skellington Pumpkin King Mini-Backpack - Entertainment Earth Exclusive spotlights Jack and measures about 10 1/2-inches tall x 9-inches wide x 4 1/2-inches deep. It also features a top and front zipper closure, a handle, adjustable straps, and applique and embroidered details. If you're a fan of The Nightmare Before Christmas, you do not want to miss this!
